metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1020014 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: docker-credential-helpers before 0.6.3 has a double free in the List functions. Jasiel Spelman discovered that a double free existed in docker-credential-helpers. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code.

criterions.comment: docker.io: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
